attributes.additional_details: This country is in a desperate situation right now. Families aren’t able to provide essentials such as food, clothing and heating because the prices of bills have gone up too much, small businesses have little to no support from the government meaning they are losing out and going under, peoples mental health is on the decline because they are worrying about how they are going to be able to afford to live and this requires say and input from all political parties with seats in parliament.
attributes.background: Urgently reopen Parliament and suspend further party conferences until the issues of working people are resolved.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624060

Decisions about party conferences are a matter for individual political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
